title: WTB - Low Grade T206 - Trying to build a set on the cheap
author: I Only Smoke 4 the Cards

posts.post_title: WTB - Low Grade T206 - Trying to build a set on the cheap
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I am about 20 cards into the thousand mile journey that is The Monster. My budget is pretty small because my wife is still in grad school. I am not looking for high grade cards. At this point I am going for quantity over quality. 

I am new to the forum but look forward to get to know you and learn more about the hobby.

Thanks!
Thank you for the messages and deals. My price range is about $20 per card.

We will have several 100+ card lots of T206's in our next auction (Feb/March), they will be loaded with HOFers and Southern leaguers. If you are not already registered you may want to do so.

Scott

[url]www.b-lauctions.com[/url]
Sent you a pm on a few cards you may need.
Thanks for all of the positive responses.
Thank you everyone who sent me a Pm. I am very pleased with the cards I purchased. The hunt continues!!!!!!!

More great cards. Thanks, Doug!

Please let me know what you have available.

I have some money in my budget. Please let me know what you have. Thanks.

Alex
I have some money to spend. Please let me know what you have to offer.
